abstract: If Apple’s password-management program for the Mac is constantly popping up alerts, you probably have some updating to do.
snippet: If Apple’s password-management program for the Mac is constantly popping up alerts, you probably have some updating to do.
lead_paragraph: Q. I changed my Mac’s user password for security reasons and ever since, I have been getting messages about programs wanting my “Login Keychain Password.” What is this and why is it happening?

headline.main: Fixing a ‘Login Keychain Password’ Error in OSX
